body:
## FrontISTR is large-scale parallel FEM program for nonlinear structural analysis.

- website : https://www.frontistr.com
- git : https://gitlab.com/FrontISTR-Commons
- documents : 
    - [EN] https://frontistr-commons.gitlab.io/FrontISTR/manual_en/index.html
    - [JA] https://frontistr-commons.gitlab.io/FrontISTR/manual_ja/index.html


## Usage

### Version 5.0

```
spack install frontistr
```

### git master

```
spack install frontistr@master
```

### Mix intel-mkl, intel-mpi

```
spack install frontistr ^intel-mpi ^intel-mkl threads=openmp
```
title: Added package for FrontISTR
